task.summary: Migrated UI, some utils, added zustand
Migrated all dependencies for communities page
Fixed CSS imports and ts imports
Migrated witnesses list and header, migrate witnesses to queries
Moved from global axios to local
Migrated community card, started community page
Migrated community menu, cover, subscribers, activities
Added queries manager for generating client and server side boilerplate code
Added one query client for each request and persist data between server and client
